name: new york style pizza dough
author: HomeBaker
description: This is a slightly modified version of HomeBaker's NY style pizza dough. Makes 2 medium 8 slice pizzas.
recipe: Whisk &$0, &$1, &$2, and &$3 together into a Dry Ingredient Mix
Mix &$4 and &$5 in a stand mixer
Slowly add the Dry Ingredient Mix to the stand mixer with a dough hook
Process on medium-low power until silky and smooth
Let warm to room temperature for 4 hours before use
